channel.title: Need help
channel.description: ok im doing abit of scarz now and i wanna no how do i get a script to make a menu pop up when u drag that lil target onto the screen like a lil menu box would pop up saying put in user name and pass

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Zalkrin Zalkrin
item.description:
@Zalkrin wrote:

just define the constants(before the begin procedure) ‘Username’ and ‘Password’ and change it to your username and password.

You can define the constants by having:
const
//Rs username:
Username= ‘Usernamehere’;
//Rs Password:
Password= ‘Passwordhere’;

If you want it to type it for you, make
TypeSend(Username);
and TypeSend(Password);
//then make it do all the autologin for you;
//These commands are in SRL, so you have to write {.include SRL/SRL.scar} right after the program line
if you need any more help, pm me and i will give you the complete script.
Zalkrin, hope i helped.

Read full topic
